rows.label: bf06360100_0010
rows.name:
The legend of the hero who saved the world
is deeply rooted in people's hearts.

rows.label: bf06360100_0020
rows.name: And you used them for your own political agenda?

rows.label: bf06360100_0030
rows.name: Even so.

rows.label: bf06360100_0040
rows.name: My desire to not let the world burn twice, was earnest.

rows.label: bf06360100_0070
rows.name: Don't give me that pretty talk.

rows.label: bf06360100_0075
rows.name:
Simply put
you just managed to secure a position of power.

rows.label: bf06360100_0080
rows.name: It pisses me off.

rows.label: bf06360100_0090
rows.name: That's what history is.

rows.label: bf06360100_0100
rows.name: Superbia could easily take a similar path.

rows.label: bf06360100_0110
rows.name: Yes...we are in no position to condemn them outright.

rows.label: bf06360100_0120
rows.name: So did this Adel guy really never return?

rows.label: bf06360100_0130
rows.name: Indeed...

rows.label: bf06360100_0140
rows.name:
The records indicate he went missing
immediately after sealing away the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf06360100_0150
rows.name:
It is likely he simply perished
during the journey home.

rows.label: bf06360100_0160
rows.name: ...He didn't just go missing.

rows.label: bf06360100_0170
rows.name: What do you mean, Holy Grail...

rows.label: bf06360100_0180
rows.name: Adel... He had foreseen everything.

rows.label: bf06360100_0190
rows.name:
He knew what would happen to the people
after the kingdom fell.

rows.label: bf06360100_0300
rows.name: But...he chose not to return.

rows.label: bf06360100_0310
rows.name:
Adel left us of his own will?
But why?

rows.label: bf06360100_0320
rows.name:
...My descendants,
I am Adel Ordo.

rows.label: bf06360100_0330
rows.name: This day I seal the Holy Grail away from the world.

rows.label: bf06360100_0340
rows.name: But this seal is not for eternity.

rows.label: bf06360100_0350
rows.name:
For when someday we humans
Become worthy of the Heavenly Grail

rows.label: bf06360100_0360
rows.name: I intend to entrust her to future generations.

rows.label: bf06360100_0370
rows.name: She is our hope...

rows.label: bf06360100_0380
rows.name:
When mankind has matured,
and learned to live better lives...

rows.label: bf06360100_0390
rows.name: she will surely respond.

rows.label: bf06360100_0400
rows.name:
Trusting that day will come,
I leave my final wish to you...

rows.label: bf06360100_0410
rows.name:
Adel foresaw much confusion and
hardship in the world ahead.

rows.label: bf06360100_0420
rows.name: And when I seemed unsure, he told me something.

rows.label: bf06360100_0430
rows.name: "This is a trial..."
